TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HtmlTextWriterStyle extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定可用於 或 物件輸出資料流的 HTML 樣式。

span.span: Specifies the HTML styles available to an or object output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和物件註冊至適當的 HTML 樣式的 HTML 字串中使用這些列舉值。 and objects use these enumeration values to register HTML strings to the proper HTML style. ## Examples 下列範例會使用列舉型別具有方法來加入`color`之 HTML 元素的樣式屬性並設定其值。The following example uses the enumeration with the method to add a `color` style attribute to an HTML element and sets its value. [!code-cpp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CPP/htmltextwriter.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CS/htmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/VB/htmltextwriter.vb#2)]
